artist_name: Bryan Scary and the Shredding Tears
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bye Bye Babylon is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Bye Bye Babylon has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian, C♯ Minor, E Major,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
